title: Matching Z $\to$ Hadrons at NNLO with Sector Showers
authors:
Basem Kamal El-Menoufi, Christian T. Preuss, Ludovic Scyboz, Peter
  Skands
abstract:
We consider leading-colour 2-, 3- and 4-jet rates in hadronic $Z$-boson decay
to derive matching conditions at next-to-next-to-leading order in the
sectorised VINCIA parton shower. In particular, we present a full
subtraction-based calculation of the matching coefficient required to obtain
the NLO 3-jet rate. This is achieved through a judicious choice of the
counter-terms, which optimises the numerical evaluation of the subtracted
double-real matrix element. We additionally give a consistent prescription for
incorporating interference effects due to multiple Born states. Finally, we
briefly comment on higher-order uncertainty estimates.
